TitlePage.Abstract:
&UnitLib; package
The &UnitLib; package extends the &LAGUNA; package and provides the library of normalized unit groups of modular group algebras of all finite p-groups of order not greater than 243 over the field of p elements.
It also contains a parallel implementation of the computation of the normalized unit group of a modular group algebra of a finite p-group (which should be retrieved from the &GAP; Small Groups Library) over the field of p elements.
